sect5.title: This Is a Fifth-Level Heading
sect5.para: This is the lowest level of section delineation available, but is not commonly used.
Next we've included a few examples of commonly used block elements. You can add these elements using the buttons in the toolbar, as well.

note.title: This Is a Note
note.para: Many people use notes to qualify a statement they made in the preceding paragraphs, or to warn their readers about pitfalls they might run into.

warning.para: This is a warning, used to alert readers to something important or encourage caution. Headings are optional for admonitions like notes and warnings.
